name: Summer with the Clarks (demo, work-in-progress)
description:
I built this throughout the month of July for Gothic Novel Game Jam.

The sub-theme is "Monster within you".

However, I had too much ambition and unable to complete the project in time. Hopefully I will complete it in the future.

Credits:

Story and coding - myself

Co-written and character design - Danièl Just

Engine used - Ren'Py
